projectDesc.p: The Göttingen Register of Electronic Texts in Indian Languages (GRETIL) is a resource platform providing standardized machine-readable texts in Indian languages that have been contributed by various individuals and institutions.

correction.p: Apparent errors have been silently corrected.

normalization.p: GRETIL normalizes all texts contributed consistently for each language. Sanskrit texts are normalized in accordance with the scheme of the International Alphabet of Sanskrit Transliteration (IAST) in order to facilitate word search across its corpus without additional transformations.

All characters that were fully equivalent to an IAST-conformant character in the text file contributed have been made to conform to the character list below. Non-conformant characters with additional information including accents, capitalization, and whitespace have been preserved as orig elements inside choice elements with their IAST-conformant equivalent in reg elements for the creation of a plain text. These additional informations will be available only in those transformations of this file that display the original information.

lg.l: yadguñjitena vinihanti navendranīla śaṅkāṃ sa vo gaṇapatiḥ śivamātanotu // Rmañj_1.1 //
vandārutā kalayatāṃ sukirīṭakoṭiḥ śrī śāradā bhavatu sā bhavapāradāya // Rmañj_1.2 //
he bhasmāṅgaviraktirūpaguṇadaṃ taṃ preraṇādaṃ śivaṃ gaṅgābhūṣitaśekharaṃ smaraharaṃ śaktisvarūpaṃ prabho /
tvāmīśaṃ karuṇārṇavaṃ śaraṇadaṃ vidyānidhiṃ nirguṇaṃ sūtendraṃ girijāpatiṃ śaśidharaṃ māṅgalyadevaṃ namaḥ /
śrīvaidyanāthatanayaḥ sunayaḥ suśīlaḥ śrīśālinātha iti viśrutanāmadheyaḥ /
tenāvalokya vidhivad vividhaprabandhān ārambhate sukṛtinā rasamañjarīyam // Rmañj_1.3 //
harati sakalarogānmūrchito yo narāṇāṃ vitarati kila baddhaḥ khecaratvaṃ javena /
sakalasuramunīndrair vanditaṃ śambhubījaṃ sa jayati bhavasindhuḥ pāradaḥ pārado'yam // Rmañj_1.5 //
tejo mṛgāṅkamaule soḍhuṃ yannaiva tejasāṃ puñjaiḥ /
ajarāmaratāṃ vitarati kalpataruṃ ca raseśvaraṃ vande // Rmañj_1.7 //
vṛthā cikitsāṃ kurute sa vaidyo hāsyatāṃ vrajet // Rmañj_1.8 //
sa yāti niṣphalatvaṃ hi svapnalabdhadhanaṃ yathā // Rmañj_1.9 //
etāni rasanāmāni tathānyāni śive yathā // Rmañj_1.14 //
śasto'tha dhūmraḥ paripāṇḍuraśca citro na yojyo rasakarmasiddhaye // Rmañj_1.15 //
sākṣādamṛtam evaiṣa doṣayukto raso viṣam // Rmañj_1.16 //
malā hyete ca vijñeyā doṣāḥ pāradasaṃsthitāḥ // Rmañj_1.17 //
jāḍyaṃ kuṣṭhaṃ mahādāhaṃ vīryanāśaṃ ca mūrcchanām /
mṛtyuṃ sphoṭaṃ rogapuñjaṃ kurvantyete kramānnṛṇām // Rmañj_1.18 //
raso grāhyaḥ sunakṣatre palānāṃ śatamātrakam // Rmañj_1.19 //
palād ūnaṃ na kartavyaṃ rasasaṃskāramuttamam // Rmañj_1.20 //
rājavṛkṣo malaṃ hanti pāvako hanti pāvakam /
pratidoṣaṃ palāṃśena tatra sūtaṃ sakāñjikam // Rmañj_1.25 //
uddhṛtya cāranālena mṛdbhāṇḍe kṣālayet sudhīḥ // Rmañj_1.27 //
rasasya daśamāṃśaṃ tu gandhaṃ dattvā vimardayet /
punar mardyaṃ punaḥ pātyaṃ saptavāraṃ viśuddhaye /
yuktaṃ sarvasya sūtasya taptakhalve vimardanam // Rmañj_1.29 //
athavā hiṅgulāt sūtaṃ grāhayet tannigadyate // Rmañj_1.33 //
sarvasiddhamatam etad īritaṃ sūtaśuddhikaram adbhutaṃ param /
saṃskārahīnaṃ khalu sūtarājaṃ yaḥ sevate tasya karoti bādhām /
dehasya nāśaṃ vividhaṃ ca kuṣṭhaṃ kaṣṭaṃ ca rogāñjanayennarāṇām // Rmañj_1.37 //
athājīrṇam abījaṃ ca sūtakaṃ yastu ghātayet // Rmañj_2.1 //
brahmahā sa durācārī mama drohī maheśvari /
samaṃ bhāgaṃ tato dadyāccharāveṇa pidhāpayet // Rmañj_2.4 //
evaṃ punaḥ punar gandhaṃ dattvā dattvā bhiṣagvaraḥ /
samyak kurvīta sūtasya devi ṣaḍguṇajāraṇam // Rmañj_2.6 //
piṣṭastataḥ svinnatanu suvarṇamukhyānayaṃ khādati sarvadhātūn // Rmañj_2.7 //
caret suvarṇaṃ rasarāṭ taptakhalve yathāsukham // Rmañj_2.8 //
puṭitaṃ śataśo devi praśastaṃ jāraṇaṃ viduḥ // Rmañj_2.9 //
dvātriṃśat ṣoḍaśāṃśena jārayet kanakaṃ budhaḥ // Rmañj_2.10 //
ruddhvā tadbhūdhare yantre dinaikaṃ mārayet puṭān /
ko vā tasya guṇān vaktuṃ bhuvi śaknoti mānavaḥ // Rmañj_2.15 //
pācito vālukāyantre raktaṃ bhasma prajāyate // Rmañj_2.19 //
pṛthak samaṃ samaṃ kṛtvā pāradaṃ gandhakaṃ tathā // Rmañj_2.22 //
saptabhir mṛttikāvastraiḥ pṛthak saṃśoṣya veṣṭayet // Rmañj_2.24 //
pūrayet sikatāpurair ā galaṃ matimān bhiṣak // Rmañj_2.25 //
prajvālya dvādaśaṃ yāmaṃ svāṅgaśītalam uddharet // Rmañj_2.26 //
gandhakaṃ dhūma [... au1 Zeichenjh] raṃ ca śuddhasūtaṃ samaṃ samam /
sphoṭayet svāṅgaśītaṃ tamūrdhvalagnaṃ tu taṃ tyajet /
adhasthaṃ mṛtasūtaṃ ca sarvayogeṣu yojayet // Rmañj_2.29 //
bhāgau rasasya traya eva bhāgā gandhasya bhāgaṃ pavanāsanasya /
saṃmardya gāḍhaṃ sakalaṃ subhāṇḍe tāṃ kajjalīṃ kācakṛte vidadhyāt // Rmañj_2.30 //
saṃveṣṭya mṛtkarpaṭakaiḥ svayaṃ tāṃ mukhe sucūrṇāṃ khaṭikāṃ ca kṛtvā /
kramāgninā trīṇi dināni paktvā tāṃ vālukāyantragatāṃ tataḥ syāt // Rmañj_2.31 //
nijānupānair maraṇaṃ jarāṃ ca nihanti vallakramasevanena // Rmañj_2.32 //
tulyaṃ sucūrṇitaṃ kṛtvā kākamācīdravaṃ punaḥ // Rmañj_2.33 //
dvābhyāṃ caturguṇaṃ deyaṃ dravaṃ mūṣāṃ nirudhya ca /
āraktaṃ jāyate bhasma sarvayogeṣu yojayet // Rmañj_2.34 //
rasatulyaṃ gandhakaṃ ca mardayet kuśalo bhiṣak // Rmañj_2.35 //
ṭaṅkaṇaṃ madhu lākṣātha ūrṇā guñjāyuto rasaḥ /
mardayed bhṛṅgajairdrāvairdinaikaṃ vā dhamet punaḥ // Rmañj_2.38 //
haṇḍikāyāṃ viniḥkṣipya pārśve pārśve ca kharpaṭān // Rmañj_2.40 //

body.p:
kalkādiveṣṭitaṃ kṛtvā nirgiled upadaṃśake /
<rasakarpūra>
piṣṭaṃ pāṃśupaṭupragāḍhamamalaṃ vajryambunānekaśaḥ sūtaṃ dhātuyutaṃ khaṭīkavalitaṃ taṃ sampuṭe rodhayet /
antaḥsthaṃ lavaṇasya tasya ca tale prajvālya vahṇiṃ haṭhāt bhasma grāhyamathendukundadhavalaṃ bhasmoparisthaṃ śanaiḥ // Rmañj_2.42 //

lg.l: tadvalladvitayaṃ lavaṅgasahitaṃ prātaḥ prabhuktaṃ nṛṇām ūrdhvaṃ recayati dviyāmamasakṛtpeyaṃ jalaṃ śītalam /
etaddhanti ca vatsarāvadhi viṣaṃ ṣāṇmāsikaṃ māsikaṃ śailotthaṃ garalaṃ mṛgendrakuṭilodbhūtaṃ ca tātkālikam // Rmañj_2.43 //
naṣṭapiṣṭaṃ tu tadgolaṃ hiṅgunā veṣṭayedbahiḥ // Rmañj_2.44 //
ūrdhvalagnaṃ samādāya dṛḍhaṃ vastreṇa veṣṭayet // Rmañj_2.45 //
ūrdhvādho gandhakaṃ tulyaṃ dattvā saumyānale pacet /
jīrṇe gandhe punardeyaṃ ṣaḍbhir vāraiḥ samaṃ samam // Rmañj_2.46 //
ṣaḍguṇe gandhake jīrṇe mūrchito rogahā bhavet /
kṣiptvātha cālayet kiṃcillohadarvyā punaḥ punaḥ // Rmañj_2.48 //
ityevaṃ gandhabaddhaṃ ca sarvarogeṣu yojayet // Rmañj_2.49 //
baddho dvābhyāṃ prayuñjīta śāstradṛṣṭena karmaṇā // Rmañj_2.50 //
akṣayī ca laghurdrāvī tejasvī nirmalo guruḥ /
dṛśyate'sau tadā jñeyo mūrchitaḥ sutarāṃ budhaiḥ // Rmañj_2.52 //
ārdratvaṃ ca ghanatvaṃ ca cāpalyaṃ gurutaijasam /
yasyaitāni na dṛśyante taṃ vidyānmṛtasūtakam // Rmañj_2.53 //
sevito'sau sadā dehe roganāśāya kalpate // Rmañj_2.56 //
kusumbhikaṃ ca karkoṭīṃ kadalīṃ kākamācikām // Rmañj_2.57 //
hitaṃ mudgāmbudugdhājyaṃ śālyannaṃ ca viśeṣataḥ // Rmañj_2.58 //
saindhavaṃ nāgaraṃ mustaṃ padmamūlāni bhakṣayet // Rmañj_2.59 //
abhyaṅgaṃ maithunaṃ snānaṃ yatheṣṭaṃ ca sukhāmbunā /
buddhiḥ prajñā balaṃ kāntiḥ prabhā caivaṃ vayastathā /
vardhante sarva evaite rasasevāvidhau nṛṇām // Rmañj_2.61 //
yasya rogasya yo yogastenaiva saha yojayet /

body.p:
Rmañj, 3
<uparasāḥ>
gandhakaṃ vajravaikrāntaṃ gaganaṃ tālakaṃ śilām /
kharparaṃ śikhitutthaṃ ca vimalā hemamākṣikam // Rmañj_3.1 //

lg.l: kaṅkuṣṭhaṃ śaṃkhabhūnāgaṃ ṭaṅkaṇaṃ tu śilājatu // Rmañj_3.2 //
ete uparasāḥ proktāḥ śodhyā drāvyāśca mārayet /
tatrādau gandhakotpattiṃ śodhanaṃ tvatha kathyate // Rmañj_3.3 //
śvetadvīpe purā devyāḥ krīḍantyāḥ prasṛtaṃ rajaḥ /
kṣīrārṇave tu snātāyā dukūlaṃ rajasānvitam // Rmañj_3.4 //
dhautaṃ yat salile tasmin gandhavadgandhakaṃ smṛtam /
vraṇādilepane śvetaḥ śreṣṭhaḥ kṛṣṇastu durlabhaḥ // Rmañj_3.6 //
aśuddhagandhaḥ kurute'tikuṣṭhaṃ tāpaṃ bhramaṃ pittarujaṃ karoti /
rūpaṃ sukhaṃ vīryabalaṃ nihanti tasmāt suśuddhaṃ viniyojanīyam // Rmañj_3.7 //
sājyabhāṇḍe payaḥ kṣiptvā mukhaṃ vastreṇa bandhayet /
bhāṇḍaṃ nikṣipya bhūmyāṃ tadūrdhvaṃ deyaṃ puṭaṃ laghu /
tataḥ kṣīreṇa gandhaṃ ca śuddhaṃ yogeṣu yojayet // Rmañj_3.9 //
tena śuddho bhavatyeṣa dhātūṇāṃ prāṇamūrchakaḥ // Rmañj_3.10 //
ekībhūtaṃ tato gandhaṃ dugdhamadhye parikṣipet // Rmañj_3.11 //
agnisaṃdīpanaṃ śreṣṭhaṃ vīryavṛddhiṃ karoti ca // Rmañj_3.12 //
gandhakaṃ navanītena piṣṭvā vastraṃ lipettu tat // Rmañj_3.13 //
tailaṃ patatyadho bhāṇḍe grāhyaṃ yogeṣu yojayet /
agnisaṃdīpanaṃ śreṣṭhaṃ vīryavṛddhiṃ karoti ca // Rmañj_3.15 //
puṃstrīnapuṃsakaṃ ceti lakṣaṇena tu lakṣayet // Rmañj_3.16 //
strī tu striye pradātavyā klībe klībaṃ tathaiva ca /
sarveṣāṃ sarvadā yojyāḥ puruṣā balavattarāḥ // Rmañj_3.21 //
rogānīkaṃ gurutvaṃ ca dhatte vajram aśodhitam // Rmañj_3.22 //
saptāhaṃ kodravakvāthe kaulatthe vimalaṃ bhavet // Rmañj_3.23 //
vyāghrīkandagataṃ vajraṃ mṛdā liptaṃ puṭe pacet /
vajrīkṣīreṇa vā siñcet kuliśaṃ vimalaṃ bhavet // Rmañj_3.24 //
evaṃ saptapuṭaṃ kṛtvā kuliśaṃ mriyate dhruvam // Rmañj_3.26 //
kāṃsyapātre tu bhekasya mūtre vajraṃ subhāvayet /
triḥ saptakṛtvaḥ saṃtaptaṃ vajrameva mṛtaṃ bhavet // Rmañj_3.27 //
matkuṇaistālakaṃ piṣṭvā tadgole kuliśaṃ kṣipet // Rmañj_3.28 //
śyāmalaḥ kṛṣṇavarṇaśca karburaścāṣṭadhā hi saḥ // Rmañj_3.32 //
hitaṃ tadbhasma saṃyojyaṃ vajrasthāne vicakṣaṇaiḥ // Rmañj_3.33 //
dīptāgnikṛt pavisamānaguṇas tarasvī vaikrāntakaḥ khalu vapurbalalohakārī // Rmañj_3.34 //
māhiṣaṃ navanītaṃ ca sakṣaudraṃ piṇḍitaṃ tataḥ // Rmañj_3.35 //

body.p:
śoṣayitvā dhamet sattvaṃ indragopasamaṃ bhavet /
<abhraka>
pinākaṃ darduraṃ nāgaṃ vajramabhraṃ caturvidham /
dhmātaṃ vahṇau dalacayaṃ pinākaṃ visṛjatyalam // Rmañj_3.36 //

lg.l: caturthaṃ ca varaṃ jñeyaṃ na cāgnau vikṛtiṃ vrajet // Rmañj_3.37 //
trirātraṃ sthāpayennīre tat klinnaṃ mardayed dṛḍham // Rmañj_3.40 //
marditaṃ pāṇinā śuṣkaṃ dhānyābhrād atiricyate // Rmañj_3.43 //

body.p:
<abhrakabhasma>
dhānyābhrakasya bhāgaikaṃ dvau bhāgau ṭaṃkaṇasya ca // Rmañj_3.44 //

lg.l: veṣṭayed bhānupatraiśca cakrākāraṃ tu kārayet // Rmañj_3.46 //
kuñjarākhye puṭe pācyaṃ saptavāraṃ punaḥ punaḥ /
dattvā puṭatrayaṃ paścāt tripuṭaṃ muśalījalaiḥ // Rmañj_3.50 //
rasaiḥ puṭettato dhenuḥ kṣārodakaṃ puṭaṃ muhuḥ /
dadhnā ghṛtena madhunā svacchayā sitayā tathā // Rmañj_3.52 //
niścandrakaṃ bhaved vyoma śuddhadeho rasāyanam // Rmañj_3.56 //
niścandramāritaṃ vyoma rūpaṃ vīryaṃ dṛḍhāṃ tanum /
bhāvitaṃ cūrṇitaṃ tvabhraṃ dinaikaṃ kāñjikena ca /
etat sarvaṃ tu saṃcūrṇaṃ chāgīdugdhena piṇḍikām /
kṛtvā dhmātā kharāṅgāraiḥ sarvasattvāni pātayet // Rmañj_3.63 //
anyāni yānyasādhyāni vyomasattvasya kā kathā // Rmañj_3.64 //
athavā kukkuṭaṃ vīraṃ kṛtvā mandiramāśritam // Rmañj_3.66 //
malaṃ mūtraṃ gṛhītvā ca saṃtyajya prathamāṃśakam /
cūrṇodake pṛthaktaile bhasmībhūto na doṣakṛt // Rmañj_3.70 //
saṃśuddhaḥ kāntivīryaṃ ca kurute hyāyurvardhanam // Rmañj_3.71 //
svāṅgaśītaṃ samādāya tālakaṃ tu mṛtaṃ bhavet /
galatkuṣṭhaṃ hareccaiva tālakaṃ ca na saṃśayaḥ // Rmañj_3.73 //
kaṭuḥ snigdhā śilā tiktā kaphaghnī lekhanī parā /
dolāyantrena saṃśodhya tataḥ kāryeṣu yojayet // Rmañj_3.76 //
tutthakaṃ kaṭu sakṣāraṃ kaṣāyaṃ viśadaṃ laghu /
rambhātoyena vā pācyaṃ ghasraṃ vimalaśuddhaye // Rmañj_3.79 //
kṛtvā tadāyase pātre lohadarvyātha cālayet // Rmañj_3.80 //
subhadraṃ mākṣikaṃ vidyāt sarvayogeṣu yojayet // Rmañj_3.81 //
ūrubūkasya tailena tataḥ kāryā sucakrikā // Rmañj_3.82 //
sindūrābhaṃ bhaved bhasma mākṣikasya na saṃśayaḥ // Rmañj_3.83 //

body.p:
<kāsīsaśodhanam>
sakṛd bhṛṅgāmbunā svinnaṃ kāsīsaṃ nirmalaṃ bhavet // Rmañj_3.85 //

lg.l: amlavargayute cādau dinam ardhaṃ vibhāvayet // Rmañj_3.87 //
sauvīraṃ ṭaṃkaṇaṃ śaṃkhaṃ kaṅkuṣṭhaṃ gairikaṃ tathā /
taṇḍulīyajalair vajraṃ nīlaṃ nīlīrasena ca // Rmañj_3.99 //

body.p:
<maṇiguṇāḥ>
muktāvidrumavajrendravaidūryasphaṭikādikam // Rmañj_3.101 //

lg.l: maṇiratnaṃ kharaṃ śītaṃ kaṣāyaṃ svādu lekhanam /

body.p:
Rmañj, 4
<18 viṣāni>
aṣṭādaśavidhaṃ jñeyaṃ kandajaṃ parikīrtitam /
kālakūṭaṃ mayūrākhyaṃ bindukaṃ saktukaṃ tathā // Rmañj_4.1 //

lg.l: śṛṅgīṃ markaṭakaṃ mustaṃ kardamaṃ puṣkaraṃ śikhī // Rmañj_4.2 //
ghanaṃ rūkṣaṃ ca kaṭhinaṃ bhinnāñjanasamaprabham // Rmañj_4.3 //
mayūrābhaṃ mayūrākhyaṃ binduvad bindukaḥ smṛtaḥ // Rmañj_4.4 //
vālukaṃ vālukākāraṃ vatsanābhaṃ tu pāṇḍuram // Rmañj_4.5 //
ghanaṃ guruṃ ca niviḍaṃ śṛṅgākāraṃ tu śṛṅgikam // Rmañj_4.6 //
kardamaṃ kardamākāraṃ sitaṃ pītaṃ ca kardamam // Rmañj_4.7 //
hāridrakaṃ haridrābhaṃ haritaṃ haritaṃ smṛtam // Rmañj_4.8 //
vaiśyaḥ pītaprabhaḥ śūdraḥ kṛṣṇābho ninditaḥ smṛtaḥ /
vaiśyo vyādhiṣu sarveṣu sarpadaṣṭāya śūdrakam // Rmañj_4.10 //
yojayet sarvarogeṣu na vikāraṃ karoti hi // Rmañj_4.11 //
viṣabhāgāṃśca kaṇavat sthūlān kṛtvā tu bhājane /
tataḥ gomūtrakaṃ kṣiptvā pratyahaṃ nityanūtanam // Rmañj_4.12 //

body.p:
<viṣasevana>
viṣasya māraṇaṃ proktamatha sevāṃ pravacmyaham // Rmañj_4.14 //

lg.l: tṛtīye ca caturthe ca pañcame divase tathā // Rmañj_4.16 //
ṣaṣṭhe ca saptame caiva kramavṛddhyā vivardhayet /
kramahāniṃ tathā pakṣe dvitīyaṃ saptakaṃ viṣam /
yavamātraṃ viṣaṃ deyaṃ tṛtīye saptake kramāt // Rmañj_4.18 //
vṛddhyāṃ hānyāṃ ca dātavyaṃ caturthasaptake tathā /
yavamātraṃ graset svastho guñjāmātraṃ tu kuṣṭhavān // Rmañj_4.19 //
viṣaṃ tasmai na dātavyaṃ dattaṃ ced doṣakārakam // Rmañj_4.20 //
pathye svasthamanā bhūtvātadā siddhirna saṃśayaḥ // Rmañj_4.22 //
aṣṭau vegāstadā tasya jāyante nātra saṃśayaḥ // Rmañj_4.23 //
tṛtīye ghoradāhaḥ syāccaturthe patanaṃ bhuvi // Rmañj_4.24 //
phenaṃ tu pañcame vege ṣaṣṭhe vikalatā bhavet /
jaḍatā saptame vege maraṇaṃ cāṣṭame bhavet // Rmañj_4.25 //

body.l: oṃ namo bhagavate ghoṇeyan hara hara dara dara para para tara tara bara bara vadha vadha vaḥ vaḥ laḥ laḥ raṃ raṃ lāṃ lāṃ lāṃ haralāṃ hara hara bhava sara rāṃ rāṃ kṣīṃ kṣīṃ hīṃ hīṃ bhagavati śrīghoṇeyan saṃ saṃ saṃ vara vara rasaḥ dha vara vara khaṇḍa ca rūpa hrīṃ vara vihaṃgama mānuṣa yogakṣemaṃ vada śeṣāre śeṣāre ṣaṣaḥ svāhā // Rmañj_4.28 //

lg.l: sapta japtena toyena prokṣayet kālacoditam // Rmañj_4.29 //
trimantritena śaṃkhena dundubhir vādayed yadi // Rmañj_4.30 //
dṛṣṭvā nirviṣatāṃ yāti api māraśatāni ca // Rmañj_4.31 //
atimātraṃ tadā bhuṅkte tadājyaṃ ṭaṅkaṇaṃ pibet // Rmañj_4.33 //
na dātavyaṃ na bhoktavyaṃ viṣaṃ vāde kadācana /
taile takre gavāṃ mūtre kvāthe kaulatthakāñjike /
taptaṃ taptaṃ niṣecettu tattaddrāve tu saptadhā // Rmañj_5.2 //
śodhanaṃ māraṇaṃ caiva kathyate ca mayādhunā // Rmañj_5.3 //
adhordhvaṃ gandhakaṃ dattvā sarvaṃ tulyaṃ nirudhya ca // Rmañj_5.5 //
nirutthaṃ jāyate bhasma gandho deyaḥ punaḥ punaḥ // Rmañj_5.6 //
taṃ bhāṇḍasya tale dhṛtvā bhasmanā pūrayeddṛḍham // Rmañj_5.9 //
uddhṛtya sāvaśeṣaṃ ca punardeyaṃ puṭatrayam // Rmañj_5.10 //
etadrasāyanaṃ balyaṃ vṛṣyaṃ śītaṃ kṣayādihṛt // Rmañj_5.11 //
mākṣikaṃ nāgacūrṇaṃ ca piṣṭamarkarase punaḥ // Rmañj_5.14 //
vṛṣyaṃ rasāyanaṃ balyaṃ cakṣuṣyaṃ kāntidaṃ śuci /
mriyate nātra sandeho gandho deyaḥ punaḥ punaḥ // Rmañj_5.19 //
arkakṣīreṇa sampiṣṭaṃ tārapatraṃ pralipya ca // Rmañj_5.20 //
vidhāya piṣṭiṃ sūtena rajatasyātha melayet // Rmañj_5.21 //
dvitraiḥ puṭaiḥ bhavedbhasma yojyameva rasādiṣu // Rmañj_5.22 //
āyuṣyaṃ dīrgharogaghnaṃ rajataṃ lekhanaṃ param // Rmañj_5.23 //
eko doṣo viṣe tāmre tvaṣṭau doṣāḥ prakīrtitāḥ // Rmañj_5.24 //
agnau saṃtāpya nirguṇḍīrasaiḥ siktaṃ ca saptadhā /
śudhyate nātra sandeho māraṇaṃ vāpyathocyate // Rmañj_5.28 //
sūtamekaṃ dvidhā gandhaṃ yāmaṃ kanyāṃ vimardayet /
dvayostulyaṃ tāmrapatraṃ sthālyā garbhaṃ nirodhayet // Rmañj_5.29 //
samyaṅ mṛllavaṇaiḥ sārddhaṃ pārśve bhasma nidhāya ca /
mriyate nātra sandehaḥ sarvayogeṣu yojayet // Rmañj_5.31 //

body.p:
<tāmrabhasmaguṇāḥ>
tāmraṃ tiktāmlamadhuraṃ kaṣāyaṃ śītalaṃ param // Rmañj_5.35 //

lg.l: sā śilā bhasmatāmeti tadrajaḥ sarvamehahṛt // Rmañj_5.39 //
bhūbhujaṅgam agastiṃ ca piṣṭvā pātraṃ vilepayet /
praharaṃ pācayeccullyāṃ vāsādarvyā ca ghaṭṭitā // Rmañj_5.41 //
puṭet punaḥ samuddhṛtya tenaiva parimardayet // Rmañj_5.42 //
evaṃ sapta puṭaṃ nāgaṃ sindūraṃ jāyate dhruvam /
vaṅgaṃ satālamarkasya piṣṭvā dugdhena taṃ puṭet /
tatkvāthe pādaśeṣe tu lohasya palapañcakam // Rmañj_5.50 //
evaṃ pralīyate doṣo girijo lohasambhavaḥ // Rmañj_5.51 //
dvayoḥ samaṃ sāracūrṇaṃ mardayet kanyakāmbunā // Rmañj_5.52 //
tridinaṃ dhānyarāśisthaṃ taṃ tato mardayed dṛḍham /
tīkṣṇaṃ muṇḍaṃ kāntalohaṃ nirutthaṃ jāyate mṛtam /
puṭedevaṃ lohacūrṇaṃ saptadhā maraṇaṃ vrajet // Rmañj_5.56 //
kumārīnīratas tīkṣṇaṃ puṭe gajapuṭe tathā // Rmañj_5.58 //
lepaṃ punaḥ punaḥ kuryād dinānte tatprapeṣayet /
lohaṃ patramatīva taptamasakṛtkvāthe kṣipettraiphale cūrṇībhūtamato bhavet triphalaje kvāthe pacet gojale /
matsyākṣītriphalārasena puṭayedyāvannirutthaṃ bhavet paścādājyamadhuplutaṃ supuṭitaṃ bhasma bhaved āyasam // Rmañj_5.62 //
yadyeva syānnirutthānaṃ satyaṃ vāritaraṃ bhavet // Rmañj_5.63 //
gandhakaṃ tutthakaṃ lohaṃ tulyaṃ khalve vimardayet /
vayaḥsthaṃ guru cakṣuṣyaṃ saraṃ medogadāpaham // Rmañj_5.65 //
āyuḥpradātā balavīryakartā rogasya hartā madanasya kartā /
ayaḥsamānaṃ nahi kiṃcid anyad rasāyanaṃ śreṣṭhatamaṃ hi janto // Rmañj_5.66 //
kūṣmāṇḍaṃ tilatailaṃ ca māṣānnaṃ rājakaṃ tathā /
ye guṇā mārite muṇḍe te guṇā muṇḍakiṭṭake /
tasmāt sarvatra maṇḍūraṃ rogaśāntyai niyojayet // Rmañj_5.68 //
adhamaṃ ṣaṣṭivarṣīyaṃ tato hīnaṃ viṣopamam // Rmañj_5.69 //
vicūrṇya līḍhaṃ madhunācireṇa nṛṇāṃ kṣayaṃ pāṇḍugadaṃ nihanti // Rmañj_5.70 //
tīkṣṇāllakṣaguṇaṃ kāntaṃ bhakṣaṇāt kurute guṇam // Rmañj_5.71 //
yathā gurumukhaṃ śrutvā sānubhūtaṃ ca tadrasam /
sa rasaḥ procyate hyatra vyādhināśanahetave // Rmañj_6.2 //
tṛṇakāṣṭhauṣadhair vaidyaḥ ko labheta varāṭikām // Rmañj_6.3 //
yasya rogasya yo yogo munibhiḥ parikīrtitaḥ /
mātrādhikaṃ na seveta rasaṃ vā viṣam auṣadham /
tryādhibaddhaṃ ca koṣṭhaṃ ca vīkṣya mātrāṃ prayojayet // Rmañj_6.5 //
rasaṃ vajraṃ hema tāraṃ nāgaṃ lohaṃ ca tāmrakam /
ṭaṅkaṇaṃ ravidugdhena piṣṭvā mūṣāṃ ca bandhayet /
mṛdbhāṇḍe ca nirudhyātha samyaggajapuṭe pacet // Rmañj_6.8 //
dravairbhāvyaṃ tataḥ śoṣyaṃ deyaṃ guñjācatuṣṭayam // Rmañj_6.10 //
syādrasena samaṃ hema mauktikaṃ dviguṇaṃ bhavet /
gandhakaṃ ca samaṃ tena rasapādastu ṭaṃkaṇam // Rmañj_6.13 //
dadhyājyagavyaṃ takraṃ vā kṣīraṃ vājaṃ prayojayet /
striyaṃ parihared dūrāt kopaṃ cāpi parityajet /
triśūlī yā samākhyātā tanmūlaṃ kvāthayed valam // Rmañj_6.20 //
malāyattaṃ balaṃ puṃsāṃ śukrāyattaṃ ca jīvitam /
ko'sti lokeśvarād anyo nṛṇāṃ śambhumukhodgatāt // Rmañj_6.27 //
bhāṇḍe cūrṇaṃ pratilikhetkṣiptvā rundhīta mṛnmaye // Rmañj_6.29 //
ye śuṣkā viṣamānilaiḥ kṣayarujā vyāptāśca ye kuṣṭhino ye pāṇḍutvahatāḥ kuvaidyavidhinā ye śoṣiṇo durbhagāḥ /
ye taptā vividhair jvarair bhramamadonmādaiḥ pramādaṃ gatāste sarve vigatāmayā hatarujaḥ syuḥ poṭalīsevayā // Rmañj_6.35 //
piṣṭvā tena mukhaṃ ruddhvā mṛdbhāṇḍe ca nirodhayet /
śuddhaṃ sūtaṃ samaṃ gandhaṃ mṛtaṃ svarṇābhratāmrakam /
ruddhvā laghupuṭe pācyaṃ bhūdhare taṃ samuddharet // Rmañj_6.43 //

body.l: imaṃ navajvare dadyānmāṣamātraṃ rasasya tu // Rmañj_6.44 //

lg.l: ayaṃ ratnagirirnāma raso yogasya vāhakaḥ // Rmañj_6.45 //
tulyāṃśaṃ cūrṇayet khalve pippalīṃ hiṅgulaṃ viṣam /
rasahiṅgulagandhaṃ ca jaipālaṃ ca tribhiḥ samam /
dantīkvāthena saṃmardya raso jvaraharaḥ smṛtaḥ // Rmañj_6.51 //
śarkarā dadhibhaktaṃ ca pathyaṃ deyaṃ prayatnataḥ /
sūtakaṃ ṭaṅkaṇaṃ gandhaṃ śulbacūrṇaṃ samaṃ samam /
pratyekaṃ sūtatulyaṃ syājjambīrair mardayed dinam // Rmañj_6.55 //

body.p:
<jvararājarasaḥ>
bhāgaikaṃ rasarājasya bhāgasyārdhena mākṣikā // Rmañj_6.57 //

lg.l: sūtaṃ gandhaṃ viṣaṃ tulyaṃ dhūrtabījaṃ tribhiḥ samam /
aikāhikaṃ dvyāhikaṃ ca tryāhikaṃ ca caturthakam /
viṣamaṃ ca tridoṣotthaṃ hanti sarvaṃ na saṃśayaḥ // Rmañj_6.65 //
vyāyāmaṃ ca vyavāyaṃ ca snānaṃ caṅkramaṇaṃ tathā /
jvaramukto na seveta yāvanno balavānbhavet // Rmañj_6.66 //

body.p:
<prāṇeśvararasaḥ>
śuddhasūtaṃ tathā gandhaṃ mṛtābhraṃ viṣasaṃyutam // Rmañj_6.67 //

lg.l: ajājīcitrakaṃ hiṅgu svarjikā ṭaṅkaṇaṃ ca yat // Rmañj_6.70 //
maricaṃ pippalī caiva pratyekaṃ ca samānataḥ // Rmañj_6.71 //
prabhavennātra sandehaḥ svāsthyaṃ ca labhate naraḥ // Rmañj_6.75 //
śuddhaṃ sūtaṃ tathā gandhaṃ lohaṃ tāmraṃ ca sīsakam /
maricaṃ pippalīṃ viśvaṃ samabhāgāni cūrṇayet // Rmañj_6.76 //
śambhoḥ kaṇṭhavibhūṣaṇaṃ samaricaṃ mārāriraktaṃ raviḥ pakṣau sāgaralocanaṃ śaśiyutaṃ bhāgo'rkasaṃkhyānvitam /
khalve taṃ khalu marditaṃ ravijalair guñjaikamātraṃ tataḥ siddho'yaṃ jvaradantadarpadalanaḥ pañcānanākhyo rasaḥ // Rmañj_6.79 //
pathyaṃ ca deyaṃ dadhitakrabhaktaṃ sindhūtthayuktaṃ sitayā sametam /
gandhānulepo himatoyapānaṃ dugdhaṃ ca deyaṃ śubhadāḍimaṃ ca // Rmañj_6.80 //
sūtaṃ gandhakacitrakaṃ trikaṭukaṃ mustā viṣaṃ traiphalam etebhyo dviguṇāṃ guḍena guṭikāṃ guṃjāpramāṇāṃ haret /
kuṣṭhāṣṭādaśa vāyuśūlamudaraṃ śoṣapramehādikaṃ rogānīkakarīndradarpadalane khyāto hi pañcānanaḥ // Rmañj_6.81 //
dvau bhāgau ṭaṅkaṇasyaiva bhāgaikamamṛtasya ca // Rmañj_6.82 //
tatsarvaṃ mardayet sūkṣmaṃ śuṣkaṃ yāmaṃ bhiṣagvaraḥ /
āmavāte vātaśūle gulme plīhni jalodare // Rmañj_6.86 //
agnimāṃdye ca vāte ca prayojyo'yaṃ raseśvaraḥ // Rmañj_6.87 //
dvibhāgatālena hataṃ ca tāmraṃ rasaṃ ca gandhaṃ ca viṣaṃ samaṃ syāt /
jayapālabījaṃ dviguṇaṃ ca dadyāt trisaptavāreṇa divākarāṃśau // Rmañj_6.89 //
vimardya nimbasvarasena cūrṇaṃ guñjaikamānaṃ sitayā sametam /
niṣkatrayaṃ ca maricaṃ viṣaṃ niṣkaṃ ca cūrṇayet // Rmañj_6.93 //
valkalairmardayitvā ca rasaṃ vastreṇa gālayet // Rmañj_6.95 //
ṭaṅkaṇaṃ tālakaṃ caiva mardayed dinasaptakam // Rmañj_6.96 //
rasatulyaṃ lohavaṅgau rajataṃ tāmrakaṃ tathā // Rmañj_6.98 //
cavyakaṃ ca samāṃśaṃ syādbhāgārddhaṃ śodhitaṃ viṣam // Rmañj_6.99 //
ātape saptadhā tīvre mardayed ghaṭikādvayam // Rmañj_6.100 //
citrakasya kaṣāyeṇa jvālāmukhyā rasena ca // Rmañj_6.102 //
pratyekaṃ saptadhā bhāvyaṃ tadvatpiṣṭaṃ ca bhāvayet /
pāne pānaṃ sitāyuktaṃ yadīcchati tadā dadet /
evaṃ kṛte na śāntiḥ syāttāpasya rasajasya ca // Rmañj_6.108 //
ebhiḥ prakāraistāpasya jāyate śamanaṃ param // Rmañj_6.112 //
sūtakaṃ gandhakaṃ lohaṃ viṣaṃ cāpi varāṭakam /
tāmrakaṃ vaṅgabhasmātha abhrakaṃ ca samāṃśakam // Rmañj_6.116 //
eṣāṃ ca dviguṇaṃ bhāgaṃ mardayitvā prayatnataḥ /
śvāsaṃ hanti tathā kāsam arśāṃsi ca bhagandaram // Rmañj_6.119 //
pramehaviṃśatiṃ caiva aśmarīṃ ca caturvidhām // Rmañj_6.120 //
na cānnapāne parihāramasti na śītavātādhvani maithune ca /
ekaikaṃ viṣasūtaṃ ca jātī ṭaṅkaṃ dvikaṃ dvikam /
rasaṃ ca gandhakaṃ caiva dhattūraphalajair dravaiḥ /
mardayed dinamekaṃ ca tulyaṃ trikaṭukaṃ kṣipet // Rmañj_6.124 //
kastena na kṛto dharmaḥ kāṃ ca pūjāṃ na so'rhati /
rudrākṣaṃ madhusāraṃ ca phalaṃ sāmudrakāmṛtam // Rmañj_6.126 //

body.p:
<candraśekhararasaḥ>
śuddhaṃ sūtaṃ samaṃ gandhaṃ maricaṃ ṭaṅkaṇaṃ tathā // Rmañj_6.130 //

lg.l: takrabhaktaṃ ca vṛntākaṃ pathyaṃ tatra nidhāpayet // Rmañj_6.132 //

body.p:
<kanakasundararasaḥ>
hiṅgulaṃ maricaṃ gandhaṃ pippalīṃ ṭaṅkaṇaṃ viṣam // Rmañj_6.133 //

lg.l: mardayedyāmamātraṃ tu caṇamātrā vaṭī kṛtā // Rmañj_6.134 //
agnimāṃdyaṃ jvaraṃ tīvramatisāraṃ ca nāśayet // Rmañj_6.135 //

body.p:
<rāvavāṇarasaḥ>
sūtakaṃ gandhakaṃ caiva śāṇaṃ śāṇaṃ ca gṛhyate // Rmañj_6.137 //

lg.l: daradaṃ ṭaṅkaṇaṃ caiva maricaṃ ca viṣaṃ tathā /
catvāra auṣadhayaḥ sarve dvidviṭaṅkaṃ ca kathyate // Rmañj_6.138 //
aikāhikaṃ dvyāhikaṃ ca tryāhikaṃ ca caturthakam // Rmañj_6.140 //
pathyaṃ dugdhaudanaṃ deyaṃ dadhibhaktaṃ ca bhojanam // Rmañj_6.141 //
mṛtaṃ sūtaṃ mṛtaṃ tāmraṃ mṛtaṃ svarṇaṃ samaṃ samam /
tulyaṃ ca khādiraṃ sāraṃ tathā mocarasaṃ kṣipet // Rmañj_6.143 //
lohapātre ghṛtābhyakte yāmaṃ mṛdvagninā pacet // Rmañj_6.145 //
tridinaṃ jīrakaiḥ kvāthair māsaikaṃ bhakṣayennaraḥ // Rmañj_6.146 //
māṣamātraraso deyo madhunā maricaiḥ saha // Rmañj_6.151 //
sarvaiḥ samaṃ śaṅkhakacūrṇayuktaṃ khalve ca bhāvyo'tiviṣādraveṇa // Rmañj_6.153 //
golaṃ ca kṛtvā mṛtkarpaṭasthaṃ saṃrudhya bhāṇḍe hi paced dinārdham /
susvāṅgaśīto rasa eṣa bhāvyo dhattūravahṇimuśalīdravaiśca // Rmañj_6.154 //
lohasya pātre paripācitaśca siddho bhavet saṃgrahaṇīkapāṭaḥ /

body.l: śleṣmottarāyāṃ vijayārasena kaṭutrayeṇāpi yuto grahaṇyām // Rmañj_6.156 //

lg.l: mohe ca kṛcchre gatadhātuvṛddhau guñjādvayaṃ cāpi mahāmayaghnam // Rmañj_6.157 //

body.p:
<vajrakapāṭarasaḥ>
mṛtasūtābhrakaṃ gandhaṃ yavakṣāraṃ saṭaṅkaṇam // Rmañj_6.158 //

lg.l: agnimanthaṃ vacāṃ kuryāt sūtatulyām imāṃ sudhīḥ /
trivāsaraṃ tato golaṃ kṛtvā saṃśoṣya dhārayet /
lohapātre ca lavaṇaṃ athopari nidhāpayet // Rmañj_6.160 //
adhovahniṃ śanaiḥ kuryād yāmārdhaṃ ca tad uddharet /
rasavajraṃ kapāṭākhyaṃ māṣaikaṃ madhunā lihet // Rmañj_6.163 //
vahniḥ śuṇṭhī viḍaṅgāpi bilvaṃ ca lavaṇaṃ samam /
pibed uṣṇāmbunā cānu sarvajāṃ grahaṇīṃ jayet // Rmañj_6.164 //
phalatrayaṃ trikaṭukaṃ śulbabhasma tathaiva ca // Rmañj_6.165 //
kāse śvāse kṣaye gulme pramehe viṣamajvare // Rmañj_6.166 //

body.p:
<ānandabhairavarasaḥ>
daradaṃ vatsanābhaṃ ca maricaṃ ṭaṅkaṇaṃ kaṇā // Rmañj_6.168 //

lg.l: guñjaikaṃ tu dviguñjaṃ vā balaṃ jñātvā prayojayet // Rmañj_6.169 //
pipāsāyāṃ jalaṃ śītaṃ hitā ca vijayā niśi // Rmañj_6.171 //
andhamūṣāgataṃ paktvā bhūdhare bhasmatāṃ nayet // Rmañj_6.172 //
guñjādvayaṃ haratyāśu hikkāṃ kāsaṃ jvaraṃ tathā /

body.p:
<triguṇākhyarasaḥ>
gandhakād dviguṇaṃ sūtaṃ śuddhaṃ mṛdvagninā kṣaṇam // Rmañj_6.174 //

lg.l: vajrakṣīrair dinaikaṃ tu ruddhvā taṃ bhūdhare puṭet // Rmañj_6.179 //
rasaḥ sarvatra vikhyāto nāma vātaripuḥ smṛtaḥ // Rmañj_6.181 //
pathyāṃ śṛṅgīviṣaṃ tryūṣam agnimanthaṃ ca ṭaṅkaṇam // Rmañj_6.182 //
tulyaṃ khalve dinaṃ mardya muṇḍīnirguṇḍijair dravaiḥ /
sūtaṃ gandhaṃ ca nāgānāṃ cūrṇaṃ haṃsāṅghrivāriṇā /
dinaṃ gharme vimardyātha golikāṃ tasya yojayet // Rmañj_6.185 //
kācakupyāṃ ca saṃveṣṭya tāṃ tribhir mṛtpuṭair dṛḍham /
vātarogān kṣayaṃ śvāsaṃ kāsaṃ pāṇḍukapholbaṇam // Rmañj_6.189 //
ṭaṅkaṇaṃ rasagandhau ca samabhāgaṃ trayo viṣam /
raso ravirvyoma baliḥ sulohaṃ dhātryakṣanīraistridinaṃ vimardya /
tadalpaghṛṣṭaṃ mṛdumārkaveṇa saṃmardayed asya ca vallayugmam // Rmañj_6.193 //
dugdhaṃ sakūṣmāṇḍarasaṃ sadhātrīphalaṃ śanaistatsahitaṃ bhajedvā // Rmañj_6.194 //
saindhavaṃ gandhakaṃ tālaṃ ṭaṅkaṇaṃ cūrṇayetsamam // Rmañj_6.195 //
palaṃ rasasya dvipalaṃ baleḥ syācchulvāyasī cārdhapalapramāṇe /
saṃcūrṇya sarvaṃ drutam agniyogād eraṇḍapatreṣu niveśanīyam // Rmañj_6.198 //
piṣṭvātha tāṃ parpaṭikāṃ nidadhyāllohasya pātre varapūtam asmin /
jambīrajaṃ pakvarasaṃ palānāṃ śataṃ niyojyāgnimathāmlamātram // Rmañj_6.199 //
savetasāmlaiḥ śatamatra yojyaṃ samaṃ rajaṣ ṭaṃkaṇajaṃ subhṛṣṭam // Rmañj_6.200 //
viḍaṃ dadardhaṃ maricaṃ samaṃ ca tatsaptadhārdraṃ caṇakāmlavāri /
māṣadvayaṃ saindhavatakrapītam etasudhanyaṃ khalu bhojanānte // Rmañj_6.201 //
gurūṇi māṃsāni payāṃsi piṣṭīghṛtāni khādyāni phalāni vegāt /
samāṃśaṃ maricaṃ cāṣṭau ṭaṅkaṇaṃ ca caturguṇam // Rmañj_6.206 //
guñjādvayaṃ parṇakhaṇḍairhanti sāyaṃ tu bhakṣitaḥ // Rmañj_6.207 //
rasaṃ gandhaṃ mṛtaṃ śulbaṃ mṛtamabhraṃ phalatrikam /
tryūṣaṇaṃ bījajaipālaṃ samaṃ khalve vimardayet // Rmañj_6.209 //
guñjaiko vā dviguṃjo vā āmarogaharaḥ paraḥ // Rmañj_6.211 //

body.p:
<rājavallabharasaḥ>
rasaniṣkaikagandhaikaṃ niṣkamātraḥ pradīpanaḥ // Rmañj_6.212 //

lg.l: ṭaṅkaṇaṃ hāriṇaṃ śṛṅgaṃ svarṇaṃ śulbaṃ mṛtaṃ rasam /
bhasma sūtaṃ mṛtaṃ kāntaṃ śulbabhasma śilājatu /
mahānimbasya bījāni piṣṭvā karṣamitāni ca // Rmañj_6.219 //
ekīkṛtya pibettoyaṃ hanti mehaṃ cirotthitam // Rmañj_6.220 //
tulyāṃśaṃ mardayet khalve śālmalyā mūlajair dravaiḥ // Rmañj_6.221 //
tālasattvaṃ mṛtaṃ tāmraṃ mṛtaṃ lohaṃ mṛtaṃ rasam /
hatamabhraṃ hataṃ tāraṃ gandhaṃ tutthaṃ manaḥśilā // Rmañj_6.223 //
tailinyo lohakiṭṭaṃ ca purāṇamamṛtaṃ ca tat // Rmañj_6.226 //
tvacā ca mīnakākṣasya punaruktaṃ palaṃ pṛthak /
khalve nidhāya dātavyā punareṣāṃ ca bhāvanā /
brahmadaṇḍī śikhāpuṅkhā devadālī ca nīlikā // Rmañj_6.228 //
dātavyā kuppikāṃ kṛtvā samyak saṃśoṣya cātape // Rmañj_6.230 //
yāmaṃ mandāgninā pacyāt puṭamadhye hyasau rasaḥ // Rmañj_6.231 //
dvimāsābhyantare puṃsāmapathyaṃ na tu bhojayet // Rmañj_6.232 //
rogāḥ sarve vilīyante kuṣṭhāni sakalāni ca /
mardyaṃ hayārijair drāvaiḥ pratyekaṃ ca dinaṃ dinam /
evaṃ saptadinaṃ mardyaṃ tadgolaṃ vastraveṣṭitam // Rmañj_6.236 //
ādāya cūrṇayet sarvaṃ palaikaṃ yojayedviṣam // Rmañj_6.237 //
vākucī caiva dārū ca karṣamātraṃ vicūrṇitam /
kartavyo dṛṣṭirogeṣu kuṣṭhināṃ ca viśeṣataḥ // Rmañj_6.240 //
vyabhre varṣāsu vidyāttu grīṣmakāle tu śītale /
svedayed dolikāyantre yāvattoyaṃ na vidyate // Rmañj_6.243 //
gharṣayed bahudhā tattu yāvatkajjalikā bhavet // Rmañj_6.244 //
nimbatvag ebhir bhaiṣajyaiḥ puṭanācca trayaṃ trayam // Rmañj_6.246 //
caturthāṃśamadhaḥ sthāpyaṃ madhye sthāpyaṃ tu tālakam // Rmañj_6.247 //
tasyopari śilāṃ dattvā dṛḍhā na ca caledyathā // Rmañj_6.249 //

body.p:
<tāleśvararasaḥ (2)>
sūto dvau valgujā trīṇi kaṇā viśvā trikaṃ trikam // Rmañj_6.252 //

lg.l: saṃmardya golakaṃ sārdraṃ dhattūrair veṣṭayeddalaiḥ // Rmañj_6.255 //
rasaḥ kuṣṭhaharaḥ sevyaḥ sarvadā bhojanapriyaiḥ // Rmañj_6.256 //
takre jīrṇe samuddhṛtya punaḥ kṣīraghaṭe pacet // Rmañj_6.257 //
palaikaṃ mūrchitaṃ sūtam ekīkṛtvā ca bhakṣayet /
śuddhasūtaṃ dvidhā gandhaṃ yāmaikaṃ mardayed dṛḍham /
tāmrabhasma dvayostulyaṃ sampuṭe taṃ nirodhayet // Rmañj_6.260 //
tato gajapuṭe paktvā svāṅgaśītaṃ samuddharet // Rmañj_6.261 //
vyāyāmaṃ maithunaṃ madyaṃ lavaṇaṃ kaṭukāni ca /
śuddhaṃ sūtaṃ samaṃ gandhaṃ tutthaṃ ca mṛtatāmrakam /
śuddhaṃ sūtaṃ samaṃ gandhaṃ triphalābhraṃ ca vākucī /
bhallātaṃ ca śilā kṛṣṇā nimbabījaṃ samaṃ samam // Rmañj_6.271 //
itthaṃ kuryāt trisaptāhaṃ rasaṃ śvetāriko bhavet // Rmañj_6.272 //
bhūdharākhye puṭe pācyaṃ dinaikaṃ tu vicūrṇayet // Rmañj_6.275 //
daśamāṃśaṃ viṣaṃ yojyaṃ māṣamātraṃ ca bhakṣayet /
śuṣkaṃ kācaghaṭe ruddhvā vālukāyantragaṃ haṭhāt // Rmañj_6.278 //
śṛtaṃ śītaṃ sitāyuktaṃ dugdhaṃ godhūmam ājyakam // Rmañj_6.282 //
abhyāsāt sādhakaḥ strīṇāṃ śataṃ jayati nityaśaḥ // Rmañj_6.284 //
ratikāle ratānte vā punaḥ sevyo rasottamaḥ /
na vikārāya bhavati sādhakānāṃ ca vatsarāt // Rmañj_6.286 //
tāraṃ vajraṃ suvarṇaṃ ca tāmraṃ ca sūtagandhakam /
lohaṃ ca kramavṛddhāni kuryādetāni mātrayā // Rmañj_6.288 //
vahniṃ śanaiḥ śanaiḥ kuryāddinaikaṃ tata uddharet // Rmañj_6.290 //
aśvagandhā ca kaṅkolī vānarī muśalīkṣuraḥ // Rmañj_6.291 //
padmakandakaserūṇāṃ rasair bhāvyaṃ tu ekadhā // Rmañj_6.292 //
sarvaiḥ samāṃ śarkarāṃ ca dattvā śāṇonmitaṃ dadet /
asya prabhāvāt saundaryyaṃ balaṃ tejo vivardhate /
yāmadvayaṃ pacedājye vastre baddhvātha mardayet // Rmañj_6.296 //
vālukāyaṃtramadhye tu drave jīrṇe samuddharet // Rmañj_6.298 //
muśalīṃ sasitāṃ kṣīraiḥ palaikaṃ pāyayedanu // Rmañj_6.299 //
kāminīnāṃ sahasraikaṃ naraḥ kāmayate dhruvam // Rmañj_6.300 //
śuddhaṃ sūtaṃ samaṃ gandhaṃ tryahaṃ kahlārajadravaiḥ /
marditaṃ vālukāyantre yāmaiḥ kūpīgataṃ pacet // Rmañj_6.301 //
yāmaṃ mardyaṃ punargandhaṃ pūrvād ardhaṃ viniṣkṣipet // Rmañj_6.303 //
pūrvadrāvairdinaikaṃ tu kācakupyāṃ nirudhya ca // Rmañj_6.304 //
pañcaguñjā sitā sārddhaṃ raso'yaṃ madanodayaḥ // Rmañj_6.305 //
paladvayaṃ dvayaṃ śuddhaṃ pāradaṃ gandhakaṃ tathā /
ruddhvā tu vai puṭe paścāddinaikaṃ tu samuddharet // Rmañj_6.308 //
samyaṅmāritamabhrakaṃ kaṭphalaṃ kuṣṭhāśvagandhāmṛtā methī mocaraso vidārimuśalī gokṣūrakaṃ kṣūrakam /
rambhākandaśatāvarī hyajamudā māṣāstilā dhānyakaṃ yaṣṭī nāgabalā kacūramadanaṃ jātīphalaṃ saindhavam // Rmañj_6.310 //
bhārṅgī karkaṭaśṛṅgikā trikaṭukaṃ jīradvayaṃ citrakaṃ cāturjātapunarnavā gajakaṇā drākṣā śaṭī vāsakam /
śālmalyandhriphalatrikaṃ kapibhavaṃ bījaṃ samaṃ cūrṇayeccūrṇāṃśā vijayā sitā dviguṇitā madhvājyayoḥ piṇḍitam // Rmañj_6.311 //
karṣārddhā guṭikāvaleham athavā sevyaṃ sadā sarvathā peyaṃ kṣīrasitā tu vīryakaraṇaṃ stambho'pyayaṃ kāminī /
rāmāvaśyakaraṃ sukhātisukhadaṃ prauḍhāṅganādrāvakam kṣīṇe puṣṭikaraṃ kṣaye kṣayaharaṃ sarvāmayadhvaṃsanam // Rmañj_6.312 //
arśāṃsi grahaṇīpramehanicayaśleṣmātiraktapraṇun nityānandakaraṃ viśeṣaviduṣāṃ vācāṃ vilāsodbhavam // Rmañj_6.313 //
abhyāsena nihanti mṛtyupalitaṃ kāmeśvaro vatsarāt sarveṣāṃ hitakārako nigaditaḥ śrīvaidyanāthena yaḥ /
vṛddhānāṃ madanodayodayakaraḥ prauḍhāṅganāsaṅgame siṃho'yaṃ samadṛṣṭiḥ pratyayakaro bhūpaiḥ sadā sevyatām // Rmañj_6.314 //
śuddhaṃ sūtaṃ viṣaṃ gandhaṃ samacūrṇaṃ vicūrṇayet /
ūṣaṇaṃ pañcabhāgaṃ syādamṛtaṃ ca dvibhāgakam // Rmañj_6.317 //
galite sphuṭite caiva viṣūcyāṃ maṇḍale tathā /
śuddhaṃ sūtaṃ samaṃ gandhaṃ mardyaṃ yāmacatuṣṭayam /
lihetkṣaudre raso raudro guñjāmātro'rbudaṃ jayet // Rmañj_6.321 //
haste pāde mukhe nābhyāṃ gudavṛṣaṇayostathā // Rmañj_6.324 //
mṛtaṃ tāmraṃ mṛtaṃ lohaṃ pratyekaṃ tu palatrayam // Rmañj_6.326 //
tryūṣaṇaṃ lāṅgalī dantī pīlukaṃ citrakaṃ tathā /
pratyekaṃ dvipalaṃ yojyaṃ yavakṣāraṃ ca ṭaṅkaṇam // Rmañj_6.327 //
gandhakaṃ tālakaṃ tāpyaṃ mṛtaṃ tāmraṃ manaḥśilā /
śuddhaṃ sūtaṃ ca tulyāṃśaṃ mardayedbhāvayeddinam // Rmañj_6.330 //
vallaṃ ca bhakṣayet kṣaudraiḥ plīhagulmādikaṃ jayet // Rmañj_6.331 //
raso vidyādharo nāma godugdhaṃ ca pibedanu /
gandhakaṃ mṛtatāmraṃ ca pratyekaṃ ca caturguṇam /
evaṃ vaṅgeśvaro nāmnā plīhagulmodaraṃ jayet // Rmañj_6.334 //
gavāṃ mūtraiḥ pibeccānu rajanī vā gavāṃ jalaiḥ // Rmañj_6.335 //
jalodaraharaṃ caiva tīvreṇa recanena tu // Rmañj_6.337 //

body.p:
<jalodarārirasaḥ>
pippalīmaricaṃ tāmraṃ kāñcanīcūrṇasaṃyutam // Rmañj_6.338 //

lg.l: niṣkaṃ khāded virekaṃ syāt sadyo hanti jalodaram // Rmañj_6.339 //
recanānāṃ ca sarveṣāṃ dadhyannaṃ stambhanaṃ hitam /
dinānte ca pradātavyamannaṃ vā mudgayūṣakam // Rmañj_6.340 //
gandhakaṃ pippalī śuṇṭhī dvau dvau bhāgau vicūrṇayet // Rmañj_6.341 //
amṛtaṃ ca viṣaṃ caiva śivenoktaṃ rasāyanam /
amṛtaṃ vidhisaṃyuktaṃ vidhihīnaṃ tu tadviṣam // Rmañj_7.2 //
ruddhvā laghupuṭe pacyād uddhṛtya madhusarpiṣā // Rmañj_7.6 //
samūlaṃ bhṛṅgarājaṃ tu chāyāśuṣkaṃ vicūrṇayet // Rmañj_7.7 //

body.p:
<hemasundararasaḥ>
mṛtasūtasya pādāṃśaṃ hemabhasma prakalpayet // Rmañj_7.9 //

lg.l: kāntalohasamaṃ hema jambīre mardayed dṛḍham // Rmañj_7.12 //
tatkalkaiśchāditaṃ kṛtvā pakṣaikaṃ bhūdhare pacet // Rmañj_7.14 //
yāmaṃ yāmaṃ samuddhṛtya liptvāmūṣāṃ punaḥ punaḥ /
etaiḥ pralepayenmūṣāṃ guṭikāṃ tatra nikṣipet // Rmañj_7.16 //
ṭaṅkaṇaṃ śvetakācaṃ ca dattvā yāme dṛḍhaṃ dṛḍham /
mūṣāyāṃ biḍayogena samaṃ hema ca jārayet /
karṣamātrā jarāṃ mṛtyuṃ hanti satyaṃ śivoditam /
śastrastambhaṃ ca kurute brahmāyurbhavate naraḥ // Rmañj_7.20 //
tataḥ śūkaramāṃsasya garbhe kṛtvātha siñcayet // Rmañj_7.22 //
saṃdhyām ārabhya mandāgnau yāvatsūryodayaṃ pacet // Rmañj_7.24 //
ratikāle mukhe dhāryā guṭikā vīryarodhinī // Rmañj_7.26 //
pūrvāhne cāparāhṇe ca grīṣme śaradi ceṣyate /
varṣāsu kuryādatyuṣṇe vā vasante sadaiva hi // Rmañj_8.2 //
ajīrṇe vegaghāte ca añjanaṃ na praśasyate // Rmañj_8.3 //
pramāṇaṃ madhyamaṃ sārdhaṃ dviguṇaṃ ca mṛdau bhavet // Rmañj_8.4 //
rasa eva marīcena andhānāṃ darśanaṃ param // Rmañj_8.7 //
vāriṇā timiraṃ hanti arbudaṃ hanti mastunā /
cipiṭaṃ madhunā hanti strīkṣīreṇa ca puṣpakam // Rmañj_8.9 //
tāmrapātre kṛtā netre hanti pīḍāṃ suvistarāt // Rmañj_8.10 //
hanti vartiḥ kṛtā ślakṣṇaṃ śukrāṇāṃ nāśinī param // Rmañj_8.11 //
gairikodakaphenaṃ ca maricaṃ ceti cūrṇayet // Rmañj_8.12 //
vartmarogaṃ ca timiraṃ kācaśukraharaṃ param // Rmañj_8.13 //
pippalī maricaṃ kuṣṭhaṃ vacā ceti samāṃśakam // Rmañj_8.14 //
timiraṃ māṃsavṛddhiṃ ca kācaṃ paṭalam arbudam /
rājyandhaṃ vārṣikaṃ puṣpaṃ varticandrodayā jayet // Rmañj_8.16 //
śuddhe nāge drute tulyaṃ śuddhasūtaṃ vinikṣipet /
bhuktvā pāṇitalaṃ ghṛṣṭvā cakṣuṣor yadi dīyate /
jātā rogāḥ praṇaśyanti na bhavanti kadācana // Rmañj_8.19 //
triphalā lauhacūrṇaṃ tu vāriṇā peṣayet samam /
nirvāte kṣīrabhojī syāt chālayet triphalājalaiḥ // Rmañj_8.23 //
yāvajjīvaṃ na sandehaḥ kacāḥ syurbhramaropamāḥ // Rmañj_8.24 //
kākamācī yavā jātī samaṃ kṛṣṇatilaṃ tataḥ /
tattailaṃ grāhayedyantre tena syāt keśarañjanam // Rmañj_8.25 //
kāśmaryā mūlamādau sahacarakusumaṃ ketakīnāṃ ca mūlaṃ lauhaṃ cūrṇaṃ sabhṛṅgaṃ triphalajalayutaṃ tailamebhir vipakvam /
kṛtvā vai lohabhāṇḍe kṣititalanihitaṃ māsam ekaṃ nidhāya keśāḥ kāśaprakāśā bhramarakulanibhā lepanād eva kṛṣṇāḥ // Rmañj_8.27 //
tailena liptāḥ keśāḥ syuḥ śuklā vai nātra saṃśayaḥ // Rmañj_8.28 //
karpūraṃ ṭaṅkaṇaṃ sūtaṃ tulyaṃ munirasaṃ madhu /
mardayitvā lipelliṅgaṃ sthitvā yāmaṃ tathaiva ca // Rmañj_9.1 //
veṣṭyā kaniṣṭhikā dhāryā naro vīryaṃ na muñcati // Rmañj_9.3 //
yāvanna spṛśate bhūmiṃ tāvadvīryaṃ na muñcati // Rmañj_9.5 //
kaṭyāmupari yad baddhvā śukrastambhaḥ prajāyate // Rmañj_9.6 //
tasyāsthi dhārayet kaṭyāṃ naro vīryaṃ na muñcati /
bhaume prātaḥ samuddhṛtya kaṭyāṃ baddhvā na vīryamuk // Rmañj_9.9 //
khasapalaṃ śuṇṭhīkvāthaḥ ṣoḍaśāṃśena guḍena niśi pītaḥ /
kurute ratau na puṃso retaḥ patanaṃ vināmlena // Rmañj_9.10 //
na muñcati naro vīryamekaikena na saṃśayaḥ // Rmañj_9.11 //
sthūlaṃ dṛḍhaṃ ca dīrghaṃ ca puṃso liṅgaṃ prajāyate // Rmañj_9.12 //
kṣaudreṇa ca samaṃ pṛṣṭaṃ puṇḍarīkasya keśaram /
pānāśanaṃ prayuktena ṣaṇḍhatvaṃ jāyate nṛṇām // Rmañj_9.15 //
śītalaṃ madhunā yuktaṃ bhuktaṃ ṣaṇḍhatvanāśanam // Rmañj_9.16 //
ūrṇanābhistu yo jīvo madhunā saha lepayet /
tena lepayato nābhiṃ baddhaṣaṇḍhyaṃ vimucyate // Rmañj_9.17 //
ārdrakaṃ gandhakaṃ caiva rājikaṃ cātha ṭaṅkaṇam /
yāvantyo lalanāḥ pañca ājighranti dravanti vai // Rmañj_9.20 //
liṅgalepena surate dravo bhavati yoṣitām // Rmañj_9.21 //
etalliptendriyo rāmāṃ dāsīvat kurute ratau // Rmañj_9.22 //
kapīndriyaṃ śaśī sūtaṃ kuṅkumaṃ kanakaṃ madhu /
etalliptendriyo rāmāṃ dāsīvat kurute ratau // Rmañj_9.23 //
tadbahiḥ klīṃ catuṣkaṃ ca likhitvā śilayākhilam // Rmañj_9.24 //
striyam ākarṣati kṣipraṃ yantrametanna saṃśayaḥ // Rmañj_9.25 //
kṛṣṇāṃ tintiḍikaṃ caiva samabhāgāni kārayet // Rmañj_9.26 //
khāne pāne pradātavyaṃ striyaṃ vā puruṣaṃ tathā // Rmañj_9.27 //
nūnaṃ saṃjāyate dveṣaḥ kathito mālatīmate // Rmañj_9.31 //
tayor dhūliṃ samādāya hanyate yoṣitāṃ ratiḥ /
satyaṃ bhavati vidveṣaṃ nātra kāryā vicāraṇā // Rmañj_9.33 //
vṛddhāpi kāminī kāmaṃ bāleva kurute ratim // Rmañj_9.34 //
dṛḍhaṃ strīṇāṃ stanadvandvaṃ māsena kurute bhṛśam // Rmañj_9.35 //
nipatanti keśanicayāḥ kautukamidam adbhutaṃ kurute // Rmañj_9.37 //
ṛtvante tryahapītāni vandhyāṃ kurvanti yoṣitam // Rmañj_9.39 //
ṛtau tryahaṃ nipītāni vandhyāṃ kurvanti yoṣitam // Rmañj_9.40 //
ṛtvante ramate sā strī garbhaduḥkhavivarjitā // Rmañj_9.41 //
pippalī śṛṅgaveraṃ ca maricaṃ keśaraṃ tathā /
ghṛtena saha pātavyaṃ vandhyāgarbhapradaṃ param // Rmañj_9.46 //
puṣyoddhṛtaṃ lakṣmaṇāyā mūlaṃ piṣṭaṃ ca kanyakā /
anyad yogavaraṃ vakṣye yena sā saphalā bhavet /
tena sā labhate putraṃ satyaṃ caiva surārcitam /
laśunaṃ kṣīrasaṃyuktaṃ nasye pāne pradāpayet // Rmañj_9.52 //
yavakṣāraṃ viḍaṅgaṃ ca guḍūcī ca hareṇukā // Rmañj_9.53 //
etatpītvā labhet putraṃ sā nārī nātra saṃśayaḥ // Rmañj_9.54 //
hiṅguṃ ca śatavīryā ca dāḍimaṃ saindhavaṃ tathā /
trikaṭuḥ śatapuṣpā ca nāgapuṣpaṃ śatāvarī // Rmañj_9.55 //
kṣīreṇa saha dātavyā nāryāśca puruṣasya ca // Rmañj_9.56 //
bhuktaṃ tu labhate garbhaṃ nārīṇāṃ nātra saṃśayaḥ // Rmañj_9.57 //
balā cātibalā chāgīkṣīraṃ pītaṃ dinatrayam // Rmañj_9.58 //
utpalaṃ tagaraṃ kuṣṭhaṃ yaṣṭīmadhu sacandanam // Rmañj_9.59 //
tena sā labhate putraṃ lakṣaṇāḍhyaṃ supaṇḍitam /
gate rakte bhage śuddhe sakṣīrā lakṣmaṇā tathā // Rmañj_9.61 //
nasye pāne kṛte garbhaṃ labhate ratisaṃgamāt // Rmañj_9.63 //
ghṛtena saha pātavyaṃ sukhaṃ nārī prasūyate // Rmañj_9.67 //
yāsāṃ puṣpāgamo nāsti ṛtukāle ca yoṣitām /
tāsāṃ kuryāccikitseyaṃ punaḥ puṣpāgamo bhavet // Rmañj_9.69 //
tiktaṃ tu tumbinībījaṃ guṭikāṃ kārayedbhiṣak // Rmañj_9.70 //
pūjādravyaṃ diśo bhāgaṃ mantraṃ tadgrāhyalakṣaṇam // Rmañj_9.72 //
prathame divase māse varṣe gṛhṇāti bālakam /
mandānāmnī samākhyātā yogiṇī tasya lakṣaṇam // Rmañj_9.73 //
dvitīye divase māse varṣe gṛhṇāti bālakam /
sunandā yoginī nāma prathamaṃ jāyate jvaraḥ // Rmañj_9.74 //
sabhayatvaṃ kṛśatvaṃ ca tadgrasta iti lakṣaṇam // Rmañj_9.75 //
tṛtīye divase māse varṣe gṛhṇāti bālakam /
pūtanā yoginī nāma gātrabhaṅgo jvaro'ruciḥ // Rmañj_9.76 //
aparāhne ca vāruṇyāṃ pañcarātraṃ baliṃ kṣipet // Rmañj_9.77 //
caturthe divase māse varṣe gṛhṇāti bālakam /
biḍālī nāma tadgraste cakṣuḥśūlaṃ jvaro'ruciḥ // Rmañj_9.78 //
pañcame divase māse varṣe gṛhṇāti bālakam // Rmañj_9.79 //
atha ṣaṣṭhadine māse varṣe gṛhṇāti bālakam // Rmañj_9.80 //
pañcarātraṃ baliṃ tasyai vāruṇyāṃ diśi nikṣipet /
saptame divase māse varṣe śuṣkāśivā śiśum // Rmañj_9.82 //
paścimāyāṃ diśi pañca balau datte śiśuḥ sukhī // Rmañj_9.83 //
aṣṭame divase māse varṣe gṛhṇāti jṛmbhakā /
tayā gṛhītamātrasya prathamaṃ jāyate jvaraḥ // Rmañj_9.84 //
dakṣiṇāṃ diśim āśritya baliṃ tasyai pradāpayet // Rmañj_9.85 //
navame divase māse varṣe gṛhṇāti bālakam /
acintā yoginī nāma gātrabhaṅgaḥ śiro'kṣiruk // Rmañj_9.86 //
uttarāṃ diśim āśritya baliṃ tasyai pradāpayet // Rmañj_9.87 //
daśame divase māse varṣe gṛhṇāti bālakam /
nāmnā kāpālikā khyātā yoginī tasya lakṣaṇam // Rmañj_9.88 //
pūrvāṃ diśaṃ samāśritya pañcarātraṃ baliṃ kṣipet // Rmañj_9.89 //
ekādaśe dine māse varṣe gṛhṇāti lipsitā /
bhānusaṃkhye dine māse varṣe gṛhṇāti bālakam /
pītalī yoginī nāma rodanaṃ vedanā jvaraḥ // Rmañj_9.91 //
uttarāṃ diśimāśritya saptarātraṃ baliṃ kṣipet // Rmañj_9.92 //
kāmasaṃkhye dine māse varṣe gṛhṇati bālakam /
bhadrakālī jvaro nāma vāmahastasya kampam // Rmañj_9.93 //
pūrvāṃ diśaḥ samāśritya baliṃ tasyai pradāpayet // Rmañj_9.94 //
tārā hi yoginī nāma jvaraḥ śoṣo'rucirbhṛśam // Rmañj_9.95 //
pakṣe ca divase māse varṣe gṛhṇāti bālakam // Rmañj_9.96 //
tadgraste cihnam ityādi dakṣiṇasyāṃ baliṃ kṣipet // Rmañj_9.97 //
kṛtvā pūjā ca kartavyā bhūpapuṣpākṣatādibhiḥ // Rmañj_9.100 //
jīvitaṃ maraṇaṃ yogī yato jānāti niścayāt // Rmañj_10.1 //
adyaiva vā prabhāte vā so'vaśyaṃ bhaviṣyati // Rmañj_10.2 //
rasaṃ rasāyanaṃ yogaṃ kālaṃ jñātvā samācaret /
dūto raktakaṣāyakṛṣṇavasano dantī jarāmarditas tailābhyaktaśarīrakāyudhakaro dīnāśrupūrṇānanaḥ /
bhasmāṅgārakapālapāṃśumuśalaḥ sūryāstasūryodaye yaḥ sūryasvarasaṃsthito gadavatāṃ kālāya sa syādasau // Rmañj_10.4 //
śarīraṃ śītalaṃ yasya prakṛter vikṛtir bhavet /
tatrāriṣṭaṃ samāsena vyāptaṃ tatra nibodha me // Rmañj_10.6 //
yo vā gandhaṃ na gṛhṇāti dīpe śānte ca mānavaḥ /
divājyotīṃṣi yaścāpi jvalitāni ca paśyati // Rmañj_10.8 //
candraṃ sūryaprabhaṃ paśyet sūryaṃ vā candravarcasam /
taḍidvātoṣitān meghān nirmale gagane carān // Rmañj_10.9 //
yaśca nīlaṃ mūrtimantam antarikṣaṃ ca paśyati // Rmañj_10.10 //
yastūṣṇam iva gṛhṇāti śītamuṣṇaṃ ca śītavat /
saṃjātaḥ saṃśayo yasya taṃ vadanti gatāyuṣam // Rmañj_10.11 //
jyotsnādarśe hi toyeṣu chāyāṃ yaśca na paśyati /
paśyatyekāṅgahīnāṃ ca vaikṛtaṃ cāpi paśyati // Rmañj_10.14 //
hrīśriyau yasya naśyetāṃ teja ojaḥ smṛtis tathā /
pāśaśaṅkā bhavedyasya durlabhaṃ tasya jīvitam // Rmañj_10.17 //
kuṭilā sphuṭitā vāpi suptā yasya ca nāsikā /
avasphūryati magnā vā sa parāsurasaṃśayam // Rmañj_10.18 //
svarūpaṃ paranetreṣu puttikāṃ yo na paśyati /
yadā hi paṭudṛṣṭiśca tadā mṛtyur adūrataḥ // Rmañj_10.19 //
na sa jīvati loke'smin kālena kavalīkṛtaḥ // Rmañj_10.20 //
rātrau dāho bhavedyasya divā śītaṃ ca jāyate /
śirastāpo bhavedyasya tasya mṛtyurna saṃśayaḥ // Rmañj_10.22 //
sadā dāho bhavedyasya tasya mṛtyurna saṃśayaḥ // Rmañj_10.23 //
arundhatīṃ dhruvaṃ caiva viṣṇostrīṇi padāni ca /
hīnāyudho na paśyanti caturthaṃ mātṛmaṇḍalam // Rmañj_10.24 //
vātaṃ mūtraṃ purīṣaṃ yaḥ suvarṇaṃ rajataṃ tathā /
pratyakṣamathavā svapne daśamāsaṃ na jīvati // Rmañj_10.26 //
kvacit paśyati yo dīptaṃ svarṇavat kānanaṃ naraḥ /
virūpāṇi ca bhūtāni navamāsaṃ na jīvati // Rmañj_10.27 //
sthūlāṅgo'pi kṛśaḥ kṛśo'pi sahasā sthūlatvamālambate śyāmo vā kanakaprabho yadi bhavedgauro'pi kṛṣṇacchaviḥ /
dhīro dhīratayārthadharmanipuṇaḥ śāntopakārī pumān ityevaṃ prakṛte tu śāntacalanaṃ māsyaṣṭame mṛtyudam // Rmañj_10.28 //
pīḍā bhavetpāṇitale ca jihvāmūlaṃ samūlaṃ rudhiraṃ ca kṛṣṇam /
vṛddhiṃ naraḥ kāmapi yanna dṛṣṭvā jīvenmanuṣyaḥ sa hi saptamāsān // Rmañj_10.29 //
madhyāṅgulīnāṃ tritayaṃ viraktaṃ rogaṃ vinā śuṣyati yasya kaṇṭhaḥ /
muhurmuhuḥ prasravaṇaṃ ca jāḍyaṃ ṣaṣṭhe ca māse pralayaṃ prayāti // Rmañj_10.30 //
yasya na sphuraṇaṃ kiṃcid vidyate yasya karmaṇi /
so'vaśyaṃ pañcame māsi skandhārūḍho gamiṣyati // Rmañj_10.31 //
yasya na sphurate jyotiḥ pīḍite nayanadvaye /
maraṇaṃ tasya nirdiṣṭaṃ caturthe māsi niścitam // Rmañj_10.32 //
spandate vṛṣaṇo yasya na kiṃcidapi pīḍitaḥ /
tṛtīye māsi so'vaśyaṃ yamaloke gamiṣyati // Rmañj_10.33 //
tārā divā candraprabhaṃ niśānte yo vidyutaṃ paśyati caiva śvabhre /
indrāyudhaṃ vā svayameva rātrau māsadvaye tasya vadanti nāśam // Rmañj_10.34 //
yasya jānugataṃ marma na kiṃcidapi ceṣṭitam /
māsānte maraṇaṃ tasya na kenāpi vilambyate // Rmañj_10.35 //
kaniṣṭhāṅguliparva syāt kṛṣṇaṃ ca madhyamaṃ yadā /
ghṛte taile jale vāpi darpaṇe yasya dṛśyate /
na vetti vai cāruhitaṃ na coṣṇaṃ vetti yo naraḥ /
kālajñānena samproktaṃ pakṣamekaṃ sa jīvati // Rmañj_10.39 //
hṛdayaṃ hastapādau ca daśarātraṃ sa jīvati // Rmañj_10.40 //
yo na paśyetpurādṛṣṭaṃ saptarātraṃ sa jīvati // Rmañj_10.41 //
dhārā bindusamā yasya patate ca mahītale /
taṃ vadanti samāsena yathoddiṣṭaṃ śivāgame // Rmañj_10.44 //
aṣṭottaraśataṃ japtvā tato vai dṛśyate śubham // Rmañj_10.46 //
varṣadvayena he nātha kartā hartā svayaṃ prabhuḥ /
trikālajñatvam āpnoti sa yogī nātra saṃśayaḥ // Rmañj_10.48 //
tadrūpaṃ kṛṣṇavarṇaṃ ca paśyati vyomni nirmale // Rmañj_10.49 //
ṣaṇmāsān mṛtyumāpnoti sa yogī nātra saṃśayaḥ /
pīto vyādhibhayaṃ rakto nīlo hatyāṃ vinirdiśet // Rmañj_10.50 //
pādau gulphaṃ ca jaṭharaṃ vināśakṛśatā bhavet // Rmañj_10.51 //
ardhavarṣeṇa varṣe vā jīvanvarṣadvayena na vā /
vināśo dakṣiṇe bāhau svabandhur mriyate dhruvam // Rmañj_10.52 //
vāmabāhau tathā bhāryā vinaśyati na saṃśayaḥ /
aśiro māsamaraṇaṃ vinā jaṅghe divā nava /
naraiḥ sevyā yathoktaṃ ca paraṃ kālasya bandhanam // Rmañj_10.56 //
